title: ENV + HTML
description:
The assignment is available online.
Submit a link to the landing page of your Web application running on Netlify.

- Your full name and section
- Links to each of the lab assignments
- Link to the Kanbas application
- Links to all relevant source code repositories

title: CSS + BOOTSTRAP
description:
The assignment is available online.
Submit a link to the landing page of your Web application running on Netlify.

title: JAVASCRIPT + REACT
description:
The assignment is available online.
Submit a link to the landing page of your Web application running on Netlify.

title: Game Design Document
description: Create a game design document outlining your game concept, mechanics, and visual style.

title: 2D Prototype
description: Build a playable 2D prototype using Unity demonstrating core game mechanics.

title: Final Game Project
description: Submit your completed game project with source code and a brief video walkthrough.

title: Binary Arithmetic Lab
description: Complete the binary arithmetic exercises and submit your solutions.

title: CPU Design Report
description: Write a report describing the design of a simple CPU including its instruction set.

title: Pipeline Simulation
description: Implement a pipeline simulation and analyze hazards and performance.

title: FPGA Lab 1
description: Implement basic logic gates on the FPGA board and document your results.

title: Sequential Circuit Design
description: Design and implement a sequential circuit on the FPGA and submit a lab report.

title: Assembly Program
description: Write and debug an assembly language program for the given specification.

title: ER Diagram Assignment
description: Create an ER diagram for the given business scenario and submit it as a PDF.

title: SQL Queries Lab
description: Write SQL queries to answer the given questions against the provided database schema.

title: Database Normalization
description: Normalize the provided schema to 3NF and explain each step.

title: Introductory Speech
description: Deliver a 2-3 minute introductory speech about yourself to the class.

title: Informative Speech
description: Deliver a 5-7 minute informative speech on a topic of your choice.

title: Persuasive Speech
description: Deliver a 6-8 minute persuasive speech arguing for a position on a current issue.

title: Qt Signals Lab
description: Implement a Qt application demonstrating signals and slots communication.

title: Qt Widget UI
description: Design and implement a multi-screen Qt Widgets application with layouts.

title: Qt Network App
description: Build a Qt application that fetches and displays data from a REST API.
